sodiumextra.option.animate_fire.tooltip: If enabled, fire animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.animate_lava.tooltip: If enabled, lava animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.animate_portal.toolti: If enabled, portal animations are processed.
If enabled, sculk sensor animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.animate_water.tooltip: If enabled, water animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.armor_stands.tooltip: If enabled, armor stands are rendered.
sodiumextra.option.beacon_beam.tooltip: If enabled, beacon beams are processed.
sodiumextra.option.biome_colors.tooltip: If enabled, biome colors are changed based on the biome.
sodiumextra.option.block_animations.tool: If enabled, block animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.block_break.tooltip: If enabled, block break particles are processed.
sodiumextra.option.block_breaking.toolti: If enabled, block breaking particles are processed.
sodiumextra.option.cloud_height.tooltip: Controls the height of clouds that are rendered.
sodiumextra.option.fog.tooltip:
Adjusts the fog effect distance on the terrain. 
0 - use vanilla fog settings
1-32 - set fog distance in chunks
33 - max fog distance (essentially disables fog)
sodiumextra.option.instant_sneak.tooltip: If enabled, the camera will not lerp upon sneaking.
sodiumextra.option.item_frames.tooltip: If enabled, item frames are rendered.
sodiumextra.option.light_updates.tooltip: If enabled, lighting updates will be processed. If disabled, this can affect lighting when generating new chunks. Only disable this if you know what you are doing.
sodiumextra.option.overlay_corner.toolti: Determines which corner of the screen the overlay(fps and coordinates) will be rendered.
sodiumextra.option.piston.tooltip: If enabled, piston extending animations are processed.
sodiumextra.option.prevent_shaders.toolt: If enabled, any type of vanilla shaders will be prevented from loading. For example, the distorted view when spectating from a spider's point of view.
sodiumextra.option.rain_snow.tooltip: If enabled, rain & snow are processed.
sodiumextra.option.rain_splash.tooltip: If enabled, rain splash particles are processed.
sodiumextra.option.reduce_resolution_on_:
Use half the resolution on retina displays, vastly improving performance on macOS.
Modifying this option will require a game restart.
sodiumextra.option.resolution.tooltip: Determines the resolution of the game when in fullscreen.
sodiumextra.option.show_coordinates.tool: Displays player coordinates on the overlay.
sodiumextra.option.show_fps.tooltip: Displays the current FPS of the game on the overlay.
sodiumextra.option.show_fps_extended.too: Displays in additional information(max, average, and min FPS) alongside current FPS on the overlay.
sodiumextra.option.sky.tooltip: If enabled, the sky will be rendered.
sodiumextra.option.sky_colors.tooltip: If enabled, sky colors are changed based on the biome.
sodiumextra.option.stars.tooltip: If enabled, the stars will be rendered.
sodiumextra.option.sun_moon.tooltip: If enabled, the sun and moon will be rendered.
sodiumextra.option.text_contrast.tooltip:
Adjusts the contrast of the FPS/Coordinates counter.
- None: Default plain white text
- Background: Renders a background to the text like the debug menu
- Shadow: Plain white text with shadow
sodiumextra.option.toasts.tooltip: If enabled, advancement and crafting recipe popups will be displayed.
sodiumextra.option.use_adaptive_sync.too: If enabled, V-Sync will be able to swap mid-frame and disable itself at times, usually notably helping responsiveness.
sodiumextra.option.use_fast_random.toolt: If enabled, a fast random function will be used for block rendering. This can affect the rotation of randomly rotated textures when compared to vanilla.
sodiumextra.suggestRSO.message: It is highly recommended you install Reese's Rubidium Options alongside Rubidium Extra. Due to the growing amount of features, it no longer fits properly on Rubidium's video options.
